name: Quora Questions and Answers
special_instructions: One of queries or languageCode must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly

Depending on the popularity of your query, you may encounter questions with many thousands of answers. Scraping these will require a ton of requests, especially if there are many such questions. Set maxAnswersPerQuestion to 0 to scrape all answers.
You can sort answers by selected parameter. On original Quora website you can also include related answers with this option, but currently this isn't supported.
You can choose to store all answers in a separate dataset for easier extraction by setting useAnswerDataset to true.
The maximum number of sessions in the pool can be set using maxPoolSize.
The maximum age of sessions in the pool can be set using maxAgeSecs.
The maximum number of times a session can be used can be set using maxUsageCount.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
